thumb.title: Your rights as a seller – know what they are
thumb.description: Selling any property can be a busy time, but when you’re preparing to make way for new owners, it’s important to understand what your rights are and what you can and can’t take with you on settlement, how your conveyancer can help you handle contract negotiations, and what to do if the sale falls through.Reference: https://www.conveyancing.com.au/articles/your-rights-as-a-seller
